long_description: The C Crane Solar battery charger uses sunlight to juice up 2 rechargeable batteries of the same type simultaneously. It puts out about 150mA and about 5 volts for quick and reliable recharging. Charger accommodates D, C, AA and AAA NiMH batteries (not included).
short_description: The C Crane Solar battery charger uses sunlight to juice up 2 rechargeable batteries of the same type simultaneously. It puts out about 150mA and about 5 volts for quick and reliable recharging.
